ygData.subject: Re: Spokes of something or other?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehehe Our level 26 wizard (at the time) completed this quest. It was incredible that he managed to get all those spokes....he went through Neriak 3rd gate
ygData.messageBody:
Hehehe Our level 26 wizard (at the time) completed this quest. It was
incredible that he managed to get all those spokes....he went through Neriak
3rd gate (Dangerous for an erudite) and lower guk...all the nasty places,
and got his quest completed within hours =) So it is possible to do it at
mid levels as well =)

Lanadina


----Original Message Follows----
From: Ben Setala <onlyanembryo@...>

It is yes Ice Comet.

In short a long, complicated, and quite worthwhile
quest for those few wizards who have reached 49th
level. Now that you've done it, pray that you have a
high enough research skill, and a good roll of the
dice :)
